data.Description: Identifying and exploiting relevant genetic variation for a trait.
Development of new or improved seed production or treatment protocols or processes, new packaging or product forms.
Desired technology, tools and protocols that aim to facilitate, improve or replace breeding, production or research processes.
Knowledge building projects that aim to improve/ generate knowledge on selected topics, including proof-of-concept feasibility studies.
Gene-regulatory networks and key regulators on selected themes (high risk, high impact).
